workflow.description: Adds VRF system with multiple indoor units connected to an outdoor unit.

workflow.name: aedg_office_hvac_vav_ch_w
workflow.description: Measure replaces existing HVAC system (if any) with a high efficiency multizone variable air volume (VAV) HVAC system (one system per floor).  The multizone VAV system (centralized cooling with zone level heating) is applied to all space types.  In select cases, the user is given the option to preserve existing HVAC schedules.  In other cases, new schedules are generated that align with AEDG recommendations.  The resulting HVAC system reflects the HVAC recommendations of the 50% Small and Medium Office AEDG.

workflow.name: envelope_and_internal_load_breakdown
workflow.description: Report provides annual and monthly views into heat gains and losses for envelope and internal loads.

argument.display_name: Skip Envelope and Internal Load Breakdown
argument.name: __SKIP__

variables.display_name: Skip Envelope and Internal Load Breakdown

workflow.name: openstudio_results
workflow.description: This measure creates high level tables and charts pulling both from model inputs and EnergyPlus results. It has building level information as well as detail on space types, thermal zones, HVAC systems, envelope characteristics, and economics. Click the heading above a chart to view a table of the chart data.

arguments.display_name: Report monthly fuel and enduse breakdown to registerValue
arguments.name: reg_monthly_details

argument.name: units
